org.svvrl.goal.gui.tool
Class Tool<T extends Editable>

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      org.svvrl.goal.gui.action.WindowAction<O>
          org.svvrl.goal.gui.action.EditableAction<T,java.lang.Void>
              org.svvrl.goal.gui.tool.Tool<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the editable object where this tool is operated
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action, TabSwitchedListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutomatonTool, NewEditableTool
public abstract class Tool<T extends Editable>
extends EditableAction<T,java.lang.Void>
implements TabSwitchedListener

A Tool appears as a button on the tool bar and can do something when the button is clicked or selected.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
